FireMon CoreÂ¶

Core holds the main base objects and logic for queries and retrun values for all of the FireMon Applications.

  • firemon_api.core.errors
  • firemon_api.core.query
  • firemon_api.core.response
  • firemon_api.core.endpoint
  • firemon_api.core.app

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
